column2: The Geek in Pictures: Signals Edition
column5: So interest rates keep rising along with commodity prices. (And gasoline prices.) And yet Democrats want to spend another $4 trillion right away. What could go wrong? Maybe the government will pay for it with gains on GameStop stock. Which is rising again.
